author: mordecai_boone
post: It is amusing to see all the thought that has gone into discussing Mr. Freeman’s thesis. Anyone with a cursory knowledge of the Turin Shroud would immediately realize his theory is fundamentally incorrect—paintings do not age, have the paint flake off, and then miraculously become 3 D negatives. That’s one miracle I cannot believe in..
title: Dear Charles Freeman, re the Famous Arnolfini Portrait by Van Eyck
